course_description: A comprehensive 16-week algorithm and data structures course designed to build strong problem-solving skills through progressive learning. From fundamentals to advanced techniques, this course prepares you for technical interviews and competitive programming.

unit_1.title: Week 1
unit_1.description: Welcome to AlgoTime Fall 2025! Get ready for an exciting journey.

unit_2.title: Week 2
unit_2.description: Building the fundamental concepts and problem-solving mindset.

unit_3.title: Week 3
unit_3.description: Core algorithmic patterns including stacks, binary search, arrays, and trees.

unit_4.title: Week 4
unit_4.description: Expanding your algorithmic toolkit with advanced problem-solving strategies.

unit_5.title: Week 5
unit_5.description: Comprehensive exploration of fundamental data structures.

unit_6.title: Week 6
unit_6.description: Introduction to graph theory and traversal algorithms.

unit_7.title: Week 7
unit_7.description: Building blocks of dynamic programming and memoization.

unit_8.title: Week 8
unit_8.description: Consolidating knowledge from the first half of the course.

unit_9.title: Week 9
unit_9.description: Complex graph problems and optimization techniques.

unit_10.title: Week 10
unit_10.description: Complex DP patterns and multi-dimensional problems.

unit_11.title: Week 11
unit_11.description: Advanced string processing and pattern matching.

unit_12.title: Week 12
unit_12.description: Number theory, combinatorics, and mathematical problem solving.

unit_13.title: Week 13
unit_13.description: Introduction to system design and scalability concepts.

unit_14.title: Week 14
unit_14.description: Complex algorithmic challenges and optimization strategies.

unit_15.title: Week 15
unit_15.description: Comprehensive review and capstone project development.

unit_16.title: Week 16
unit_16.description: Final assessments and technical interview preparation.
